alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 05 at 10:33PM CDT until July 05 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CHEYENNE COUNTY... At 933 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Colton, or 8 miles southeast of Sidney, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. Quarter sized hail was reported 7 miles south southeast of Sidney with this storm. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Lodgepole and Sunol. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 63 and 77. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Cheyenne.
